data.eml:eml: New and little – known stoneflies (Plecoptera) from Albania and the neighbouring countries

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Murányi, Dávid (2007): New and little – known stoneflies (Plecoptera) from Albania and the neighbouring countries. Zootaxa 1533: 1-40, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.177757
